In this tutorial, you will learn the Ant Java tool for generating projects.
在本教程中, 您将学习Ant这个Java项目生成工具.
Tools like Ant, JUnit, XDoclet, Hibernate , and Spring can be difficult to get started with.
同时使用像Ant, JUnit, XDoclet, Hibernates 和Spring这样的工具是非常困难的.
Ant a java project generation tool with a flexible, user - friendly advantages.
英文原版资料. ant 作为java项目生成工具,具有灵活 、 易用的优点.
Unlike the traditional ant colony algorithm used only one ant colony algorithm used multiple ant colonies.
该算法改变了传统蚁群算法只有一个蚂蚁群体的做法,使用多个蚂蚁子群体同时进行优化处理.
When the lid on an ant colony is raised, a whiff of dead cockroach - ant chow - wafts by.
当蚁群的巢箱盖兹被揭开时, 一股死蟑螂 —— 蚂蚁的食物 —— 的气息扑面而来.
